altername_name: The Quest for the Maltese Chicken
name: The Maltese Chicken
overview: Detective Bogey's new case is to retrieve the Maltese Chicken's fabulous golden egg that is lays once every blue moon. Bogey has traced the Maltese Chicken to its mountain hideout. To reach its nest, he must first pass through the underground Enchanted Castle that surrounds the nest, dodging orcs, fireballs, soldiers, arrows, witches, snakes and even killer balloons! Stick left/right moves in those directions, down is duck, push up to jump straight up. Moving left or right and pushing the button jumps in that direction. Space will pause the game.
